title: krishnaverma
author: krishnaverma
content: Not an official thread but would be a cool contest to see who can spot changes first. Let me start with one.Now , there is new tag OP showing in each thread behind the user who has started the thread. Have you noticed this change before this thread ? What about any other change on the bitcointalk forum ? Have you seen any recently.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: OP had been added long ago. Since here- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5412983.msg60923041#msg60923041Haven't noticed any other changes, not sure what you are referring actually? Maybe about Phishing Warning on private message.Or stopping the forum ad slots.

comments.body: ^ Exactly, nothing major except the OP tag and the absence of the forum ads.We're still waiting for the major release of Bitcointalk 2 though /s

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on November 06, 2022, 07:36:28 AMNot an official thread but would be a cool contest to see who can spot changes first. Let me start with one.Now , there is new tag OP showing in each thread behind the user who has started the thread. Have you noticed this change before this thread ? What about any other change on the bitcointalk forum ? Have you seen any recently. OP being on the user that starts a thread is no more new. I have not seen any recently. Talking about new changes to the forum on a single thread like this is not necessary. If you do not understand anything about any changes, you can create a topic about it and ask. If you do not know about any changes, you may later know, but if you do not know about it, it is not necessary knowing it until you know it.The changes are not often but rear and any active user of this forum will know about it, only users that are not active may not know about it fast.

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on November 06, 2022, 09:37:50 AMChanges in Bitcointalk software rarely occur. Or might be those are so small that we do not notice.  This thread will help us keep track of these changes.

comments.author: Falconer
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on November 06, 2022, 07:36:28 AMWhat about any other change on the bitcointalk forum ? Have you seen any recently.There are several, but they may have been discussed and known.The factoid slot is no longer at auction and advertises various sites other than those oriented towards forums, forum statistics and knowledge about bitcoin.The OP's feature was added to recognize who created the topic when he replies in his own topic.Not yet, but will soon be.The rest, just modify it as you want with some user extensions.In my opinion, any newly implemented changes in the forum will be announced by the admin. I don't know if it's important to have some sort of new change update log thread for the forum, but if it's for referencing users to know what has changed over a period of time then I think the OP needs to have the list and the official announcement.
